visual.name: smartFilterByOKVizModByNishchhal
visual.displayName: Smart Filter by OKViz Mod By Nishchhal
visual.description: Smart Filter by OKViz works like an observer, showing the current filters set in the report page, or like a slicer, allowing you to choose records from a drop-down list or search by typing a few letters. This has been modified by nishchhal to cater delimiter and contains filter using Advanced Filter API.

author.name: OKViz - a trademark of SQLBI MOD by nishchhal
